title: Spotify tests more personalized, AI-powered ‘Prompted Playlists’
description: The playlists can factor in world knowledge, go back to your listening history from day one, and be refreshed daily or weekly.
content: The playlists can factor in world knowledge, go back to your listening history from day one, and be refreshed daily or weekly.
